      • r

        Get true or false based on random percent

      • evaluate

        public static double evaluate(String expression,
                              Double... args)
                       throws ScriptException,
                              IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Evaluates an expression using javascript engine and returns the double result. This can take variable parameters, so you need to define them. Parameters are defined as $[0-9]. For example evaluate("4$0/$1", 1, 2); This makes the expression (4x1)/2 == 2. Keep note that you must use 0-9, you cannot skip, or start at a number other than 0.
        Parameters:
        expression - the expression with variables
        args - the arguments/variables
        Returns:
        the resulting double value
        Throws:
        ScriptException - dont fuck up
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - learn to count

      • tps

        public static double tps(long ns,
                         int rad)
        Get the ticks per second from a time in nanoseconds, the rad can be used for multiple ticks
        Parameters:
        ns - the time in nanoseconds
        rad - the radius of the time
        Returns:
        the ticks per second in double form
